job_tasks.phrase: Creëer slimme workflows met tools zoals Make.com, Bubble en Webflow, en integreer AI-modellen om processen efficiënter te maken.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase describes the creation of workflows and integration of AI models using specific tools, which falls under building and deploying applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkel schaalbare no-code applicaties die perfect aansluiten op de behoeften van klanten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions the development of scalable applications, a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Koppel systemen (zoals Airtable, CRM's en marketingtools) naadloos aan elkaar voor soepele dataflows.
job_tasks.justification: Connecting different systems and ensuring data flows smoothly is a key integration task in software development.

job_tasks.phrase: combineer AI met automation voor innovatieve toepassingen.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions combining AI with automation for applications, implying the use and integration of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Help klanten en collega's bij het vinden van de beste no-code oplossingen en combineer AI met automation voor innovatieve toepassingen.
job_tasks.justification: This includes advising on solutions and combining AI, pointing towards the application of AI modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: integreer AI-modellen om processen efficiënter te maken.
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions integrating AI models, which is a form of applying or modeling.

soft_skills.phrase: Help klanten en collega's bij het vinden van de beste no-code oplossingen
Duik de techniek in om bottlenecks te identificeren en creatieve oplossingen te bedenken.
combineren AI met automation voor innovatieve toepassingen.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes no-code tools (Make.com, Bubble, Webflow) and the integration of AI models to enhance workflows and applications. While AI is mentioned, the primary focus is on leveraging existing AI models within a no-code/low-code development context, rather than deep ML engineering or GenAI specialization.
